maqras.text: When the sky is split asunder
and responds to its Fosterer, a duty incumbent on it
And when the earth is stretched out
and casts forth that which is in it and becomes empty
and responds to its Fosterer, a duty incumbent on it
O man! you are certainly labouring towards your Fosterer, with a labour, so you will meet Him
So as for him who is given his record (of deeds) in his right hand
he will be called to account, with an easy accountability
and he will return happily to his class of people
And as for him who is given his record (of deeds) behind his back
he will call for (i.e. invoke) destruction (upon himself)
and he will enter the (hot) blaze
He was certainly happy in his class of people (in the worldly life)
He certainly thought that he would never return
Why not, his Fosterer was certainly seeing him
So I do swear by the redness of the sunset
and the night and that which it gathers
and the moon when it is full
You will definitely be carried from stage to stage
So what is wrong with them that they do not believe
And when the Quran is, recited to them, they do not prostrate
No, those who do not believe, deny
And Allah knows best what they hide
So give them the news of the painful punishment
except those who believe and do righteous works, for them there is an unfailing reward
By the sky containing galaxies of stars
and the promised day
and the witness and the witnessed
Be killed owners of the pit
(of) the fire containing fuel
when they sat around it
And they were (themselves) witnesses over that which they did with the believers
And they did not avenge them except (for the fact) that they believed in Allah, the Mighty, the Praised
Whose is the kingdom of the skies and the earth, and Allah is a Witness over everything
Those who persecute the believing men and the believing women then do not repent, then certainly for them is the punishment of hell and for them is the punishment of burning
Those who believe and do righteous works, certainly, for them are the gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great achievement
The grip of your Fosterer is certainly strong
It is certainly He Who causes to begin (originates) and causes to repeat (reproduces)
And He is Protectively Forgiving, the Loving
Possessor of the glorious throne
Doer of what He intends
Has there come to you the story of the armies of
Firawn and Samood
No, those who do not believe are in falsehood
and Allah encompasses them from every side (without their notice)
No, it is a glorious Quran
in a guarded tablet
By the sky and the Taariq
And what will make you realize what Taariq is
(It is) the piercing star
There is not a single soul which does not have a custodian over it
So let man see from what he was created
He was created from gushing water (fluid)
that comes out from in between the loins and the ribs
He is certainly able to return him, (and make him face)
the day, (when) secrets will be examined
then there will neither be strength nor a helper for him
By the sky that returns (the water in the form of rain)
and the earth that splits (due to vegetation)
this (Quran) is certainly a decisive statement
and it is not (something to be taken as) a joke
They certainly plot a plot
and I (too) plot a plot
So give time to the infidels, give them time for a while
